website_summaries.verdict: Good selenium supplement at a good price with versatile use.
pros: Professed to help with a myriad of health issues from postpartum blues to prostate issues
Most consumers take to help with sluggish thyroid and see tangible results
cons: Not ideal for people sensitive to food allergens
Some questions raised about where this product is sourced

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: If you live in The Pacific Northwest, parts of the Great Lakes region and east of it toward New England or parts of the Atlantic Coast and focus your diet on locally grown foods, you may be low in selenium. You may also have low levels of selenium if you smoke cigarettes, drink alcohol, have had weight loss surgery, or have Crohn's disease or ulcerative colitis. I live in The Pacific Northwest and have hypothyroidism and an autoimmune disease which low levels of selenium could contribute to. I have learned that it is important that I supplement and I think BRI has a good product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this form of selenium because supposedly our bodies assimilate this form better. I also am hoping the research is ac
customer_reviews.text: I use this with the nascent iodine. I have read research stating selenium work synergistically with the nascent iodine for thyroid health and that also selenium helps remove mercury from the body. I purchased this form of selenium because supposedly our bodies assimilate this form better. I also am hoping the research is accurate in helping the body excrete mercury. As I have old fillings this would be a great benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Meme

customer_reviews.title: A Thyroid Boost For Me
customer_reviews.text: Researching Hashimoto's Disease and read that this supplement was good for a healthy thyroid. I called my pharmacist and he said it was safe to take with my Armour prescription.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I purchased 2 cans. Both arrived factory sealed, ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 cans. Both arrived factory sealed, as expected. However, one of the cans was much lighter than the other. When I opened it and counted capsules, there were only 32 instead of 180. I recorded the whole process on video. Very disappointing. UPDATE: I'm changing my rate to 4 stars, because not only the defective item was completely refunded including the shipping cost, but the seller promptly addressed the issue by sending a new can free of charge. I'd also like to emphasize that it was clearly a manufacturer's defect, so the seller wasn't directly responsible for that.
customer_reviews.author: Denis Mikhailitsky

customer_reviews.title: BRI Nutrition Selenium.
customer_reviews.text: The supplement appears to be doing what I brought it for, which is thyroid support. I'm very happy with it. ***UPDATE*** I have repurchased this supplement. My thyroid goiter has deceased in size stopping the need a for surgery that would be very dangerous for me to have because of other health issues.
customer_reviews.author: E.J.G.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I ordered these!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is actually taking these!!! Easy to swallow capsules with no aftertaste. :) We are taking them for their preventative quality. customer_reviews.title: I feel pretty good.

She suggest me to eat some supplememt such as Selenium because that Selenium is a trace element that is naturally present in many foods, added to others, and available as a dietary supplement. Selenium, which is nutritionally essential for humans, is a constituent of more than two dozen selenoproteins that play critical roles in reproduction, thyroid hormone metabolism, DNA synthesis, and protection from oxidative damage and infection. I have been taking it for a month, I feel pretty good.

customer_reviews.title: MAKE SURE THAT YOU ARE FOLLOWING YOUR ORIGINAL SEARCH CRITERIA.  VEERING OFF THE PATH COULD LEAD TO ANYWHERE!
customer_reviews.text: I searched for organic sources of Selenium. Somehow, this brand came up. I assumed that I was still researching organic supplements. I ordered it, only to discover upon delivery, that it is not organically sourced. I may be at fault. I know now that I must be careful when researching on Amazon, that the thread I am following descends from the original search, ie, Organic Selenium, and does not branch out to, say, non-organic selenium, when you follow a branching grouping, eg, "Show all 99 products." I have learned a valuable lesson, and I caution others to do the same!

There is a very useful book by the same name, available here on Amazon. For the Hashimoto's sufferer, one of the first steps back to feeling well, imho, should be to take a selenium supplement. You could not ask for a better value than this high quality, six month supply of selenium from BRI Nutrition.

customer_reviews.title: AUTOIMMUNE ILLNESS DISASTER
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product as a supplement to help with heart problems and osteoarthritis. Sounds good right? I was born with an autoimmune illness currently out of remission. Any person with an autoimmune disease should not under any circumstances take this supplement. It will affect your immunity and your illness in a very negative way. The data provided is woefully inadequate to enable one to make a good decision. I learned a lesson - I will now review all supplement and vitamin data with webmd supplements site before making a purchase. I was charged over $8 to return one bottle. Not happy with BRI Nutrition.

It seems to work well with my thyroid medicine (levothyroxine). Having an under active thyroid (hypothyroidism) this supplement helps and have also dropped a couple of pounds. My TSH levels are approximately the same if I didn't take them, so no harm or negative blood work. I do have more stamina and not as tired. I will keep taking them from now on!

I will continue to take selenium and love this brand.

product_meta.title: BRI Nutrition Selenium - Natural Antioxidant Supplements Helps to Fortify Immune System, Maintain Heart Health & Combat Free Radical Damage - 200mcg, 180 Vegetable Cellulose Capsules
product_meta.description: Color:180 CountSelenium is an essential nutrient for your body, yet it doesn't produce it on its own. Selenium is found in many common foods but in very small amounts. There's a good chance you're not getting enough of this vital nutrient from your diet alone. Make sure you're giving your body everything it needs with pure selenium from BRI Nutrition.
feature_bullets: ★WHY US: We looked at all other Selenium supplements on the market and were surprised of the poor quality supplements out there. We decided we should source the finest ingredients and sell them at a reasonable price. BRI Nutrition Selenium Supplement provides an amazing essential nutrient to make you feel great.

★HOW IT WORKS: Selenium is an essential nutrient, which means our bodies need it but can't produce it. Selenium is required by the body to maintain a heart health and fortifies the immune system, helping your body fight off any infections. Additionally, Selenium is a great way to stop free radicals from causing further damage to cells, a great way to preserve a healthier body, and support healthy living.

★PURITY: We use only the finest ingredients, all of which are manufactured in our US, GMP compliant, state-of-the-art, facility. Every batch is laboratory tested for quality assurance. OUR GUARANTEE: We're very so confident that you'll love this product that we offer a 60-day, 100% money-back guarantee.

★SHARE: Consider ordering one bottle for yourself and another for a friend or loved one. Keep each other motivated and reach your goals together and more quickly. BRI Nutrition stands by every quality product we make. We manufacture only premium vitamins, capsules, pills, tablets, powders, multivitamins, supplements, topical liquids, serums, vegan foods and extracts for men, women, and children. Check BRINutrition out today!
